channel.title: systemPipeR
channel.description: Intended as a documentation theme based on Jekyll for technical writers documenting software and other technical products, this theme has all the elements you would need to handle multiple products with both multi-level sidebar navigation, tags, and other documentation features.

item.title: Sample post
item.description:

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
Theme updates:

  • Permalinks
  • Kramdown
  • URL specified in config file
  • removed PDF output
  • removed some of the alternative layouts
  • added blog feature
  • sidebars configurable per page

item.title: Test post from last year
item.description: This is just a test post from the previous year.
